nodes.text: The Duel is a forthcoming animated short film and episode of the forthcoming web television series Star Wars: Visions. Produced by Kamikaze Douga, the short is scheduled to premiere on Disney+ on September 22, 2021. It focuses on the Jedi and Sith, but with an alternate history pulled from Japanese lore. Ronin: A Visions Novel by Emma Mieko Candon ties directly into the world of The Duel.
